import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Col, Card} from "react-bootstrap" import {authContext} from '../context/AuthContext' const Profile = () => { const [tweet, setTweet] = useState() const {auth} = useContext(authContext) const submitTweet = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetch("http://localhost:8080/users/" + auth.data.id) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } return(
Send a tweet: setTweet(e.target.value)} className={"bg-dark text-white"} placeholder= "" />
) } export default Profile
